jsx.ui.css
Class Pseudo

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.Source
              jsx.ui.Widget
                  jsx.ui.css.Pseudo

public final class Pseudo
extends Widget

A class of wrapper widgets that facilitates to efficiently manage CSS pseudo class selectors over the underlying HTML elements of the wrapped components.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Constructor Detail

Pseudo

public Pseudo(Component c,
              java.lang.String pseudo)

Typically constructs a Pseudo widget.

This constructor invokes the typical constructor of the super class with the given component as argument.

Parameters:
c - The underlying component for the Pseudo widget being constructed.
pseudo - The name of a CSS pseudo class selector for the Pseudo widget to manage.
Since:
1.0
Method Detail

attach

public final ArrayLike<Handle> attach(Component c,
                                      java.lang.String activator,
                                      java.lang.String deactivator)

Sets up events of the underly HTML element to activate or deactivate the pseudo selector.

Parameters:
c - The underlying component to handle the browser events.
activator - A browser event to add the pseudo selector to the component.
deactivator - A browser event to remove the pseudo selector from the component.
Returns:
An array of the two Handles being set up.
Since:
1.0

toggle

public final Handle toggle(Component c,
                           java.lang.String bevt)

Sets up a browser event of the underly HTML element toggling to activate and deactivate the pseudo selector.

Parameters:
c - The underlying component to handle the browser events.
bevt - A browser event toggling to add and remove the pseudo selector of the component.
Returns:
The Handle being set up.
Since:
1.0

getToggler

public final JsFunction<java.lang.Boolean> getToggler()

Gets a function that toggles to add and remove the pseudo selector against the underlying component.

Returns:
The toggling function.
Since:
1.0

getAdder

public final JsFunction<java.lang.Boolean> getAdder()

Gets a function that adds the pseudo selector to the underlying component.

Returns:
The pseudo selector adding function.
Since:
1.0

public final JsFunction<java.lang.Boolean> getRemover()

Gets a function that removes the pseudo selector from the underlying component.

Returns:
The pseudo selector removing function.
Since:
1.0
